scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/web && yarn dev" "cargo tauri dev"
scripts.migrate:dev: cargo run --bin prisma migrate dev --schema packages/core/prisma/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:gen: cd packages/core/prisma/ && cargo run --bin prisma -- generate
scripts.build: concurrently "cd apps/web && yarn build" "cargo tauri build"
